page.title: 05Pilots and Customs:Airport
page.content: {Pilots:}the Airport employs 6 pilots. They have three planes,a Dash 7 and 2 Twin Otters. The Dash 7 flies from Aberdeen to Unst. It has 50 seats,weighs 4400 pounds, and carries 9900 pounds of fuel.It can't carry any more unless on a ferry flight when you can put a fuel tank where the passengers normally sit. Pilots can be trained with the Air Force,or Privately or in the the State School of Flying.The pilots enjoy their job. {Customs and Excise:}they check for drink, drugs and firearms being taken in and out to and from the rigs. They handle about 50 to 300 bags a day of workers going to and from 3 oil fields - Ninian North, Central and South. All the searching is done by hand as they have no sophisticated X-ray equipment.
